data.text:
Open wide! Did you know that we have 14 Boeing 747-8F aircraft in our #Cargo fleet? Each of them holds an impressive maximum payload of approximately 135,000 kg – that’s the same weight as about 108,000 bottles of wine!

📸: IG@brands748 https://t.co/i2mtmsmHjX

Introducing: the #CathayCare Kit. Part of our enhanced inflight safety measures to help our customers fly with confidence, this handy package is distributed to all our passengers so that you can stay healthy when you travel with us.

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond https://t.co/wkuu8cBCqj

data.text:
Our next hidden gem in Hong Kong brings us to a place where time runs slower and fishing boats meander. Where are you? Tai O, of course! From pink dolphins to houses on stilts, there’s plenty to see even in 6 hours, making this a perfect day trip!

📸: IG@troubl_m.ker https://t.co/jLCBUAkF6b
When you choose your seat 💺 do you prefer window or aisle? “Like” for window and retweet for aisle! https://t.co/jisjzZDXC0

data.text:
Aviation fans! Based on the photo, do you think our Cargo aircraft is landing or taking off? Let us know your guess in the comments… and no cheating!

📸: IG@gskphoto01 https://t.co/dxLxuNjZnU

#CathayCare is our commitment to your wellbeing. We’ve introduced enhanced measures at every stage of the journey so you can fly with confidence again. Learn more: https://t.co/NGtnb7YFUu https://t.co/ksYVYcFvuG

#MoveBeyond – After 24 years of loyal service, we’re saying goodbye to B-HLJ, the world’s first Airbus A330. Once the world’s largest twinjet, it joined our fleet back in 1996. Flying for the last time on 17 July, B-HLJ concluded 63,900 hours and 26,983 cycles of service! https://t.co/FXVGD29P5D

As of December 2019, all our cockpits are fully paperless. The digitisation of all manuals and paperwork saved 13.4 million kilograms of paper per year, reducing our carbon emission by 4000 tonnes. Learn more about our paperless cockpits at https://t.co/c4EfegGQf7 https://t.co/HBiw0JjWMi

data.text: In 2019, we sent 1,175 tonnes of food waste from our kitchens and canteens to O∙PARK1, the first organic resources recovery centre in Hong Kong. This waste is then converted through anaerobic digestion into biogas for electricity generation. https://t.co/Bu4EuEKNhu
See more in our 2019 Sustainability Report: https://t.co/Kn3vJjAeoN https://t.co/JtgEBr5nNU

In 2019, we reduced our environmental impact by welcoming 6 new A350s, which can improve fuel efficiency by up to 25%. 33,922 tonnes of CO2 were also offset through our carbon offset programme, equating to the carbon sequestration of 28,000 football pitches' worth of forests!

For the first time ever, we removed some seats from our B777 to increase cargo capacity by 12 tonnes so as to meet global shipping demand! To ensure that the goods are delivered safely, we even have cabin crew as cargo marshals looking after the goods during the flight! https://t.co/BRRej4FdXs

data.text:
With a total of 3,400 statues and over 700 figures, Duomo di Milano is one of the most intricately decorated buildings in the world. 😲 Where was the most the awe-inspiring architecture you've come across on your voyages?

📸: IG@a_ontheroad https://t.co/HC2LYSsL5v

data.text:
Check out this glorious birds-eye view of the #SumidaRiver winding through central #Tokyo. From the Seine in Paris to the Chao Phraya in Bangkok, what are your favourite rivers in cities around the world?

📸: Instagram@_deepsky https://t.co/RxbeYzwWzh

As an airline, we appreciate both the beauty and function of bridges, because just like us, they connect people and places. We especially admire cleverly designed bridges that are also pleasing to the eye. What are some of your favourite bridges? Let us know in the comments. https://t.co/JO0jpSvRGT

Despite the difficulties of COVID-19, we’ve continued our dedication to developing all aspects of the Cathay experience sustainably. To learn more about our ongoing efforts to reduce our environmental impact, check out our 2019 Sustainability Report at https://t.co/pv5c67sLBz https://t.co/MLxGBIFuJV

The Dragon Boat Festival is a colourful day with a rich history, celebrated with many fun activities like eating rice dumplings, balancing eggs, and racing dragon boats. Do you know what are the different crew positions in a #dragonboat?

📸IG@tjfoo_ https://t.co/P8XXmS4GQn

Across the Pasig River from the world's oldest Chinatown lies Intramuros, one of Manila's oldest districts. The coastal city is also one of our oldest destinations (we've flown there since 1946 - the year we were founded!)

Can you spot the 5 differences between these 2 shots? https://t.co/biEe64qwJ6

data.text: There are over 1,000 #windmills in the #Netherlands, which have been used for pumping water, sawing wood and grinding grains. Kinderdijk, which is a 1.5hr drive from #Amsterdam, has 19 windmills. Can you catch one of them as it zooms past? Share your screenshot in the comments! https://t.co/pIsDD4TdO6

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Fly confidently with Cathay Care
We've carefully considered what matters most to you about travelling. That’s why we’ve introduced enhanced measures across every stage of the journey, from check-in to the cabin, to help you travel with confidence. https://t.co/sizQugZzTg
We’ve got 12 beautiful A350-1000 aircraft in our fleet, with the first commercial flight in July 2018, to Taipei. Powered by the latest Rolls-Royce Trent XWB-97 engines, can you guess its range?

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We've implemented a number of measures to give you the protection and confidence to fly again. From 29 May, we will require passengers to answer health screening questions upon check-in. For more about other measures, visit our COVID-19 information centre: https://t.co/Yh2ipu0wdV https://t.co/2wlj9PycjB

data.text: These past few months, we've worked to help our home city by sharing a particular resource: inflight meals! With our partners, Food Angel, we distributed 38,000+ free meals to Hong Kong's elderly and underprivileged families. Now, more than ever, is the time to come together. https://t.co/qQqVrSCuuf

Kuala Lumpur’s PETRONAS Twin Towers soar over 450 metres, while a walk along the world’s highest 2-storey Skybridge (it’s 170 metres up) offers epic views across the city below. Can you catch this impressive duo as they race across the screen? Show us with a screenshot! https://t.co/tDMFgRf1yF

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: With many domestic workers unable to travel home due to COVID-19, we’ve partnered with Cathay ChangeMaker Eni Lestari Andayani Adi, to gift them some of our amenity kits. We hope this small gesture will brighten their days as they continue to help care for Hong Kong families. https://t.co/0XG6KWMPDs

data.text:
In Hong Kong, nature and urban life co-exist. Our highest peak, Tai Mo Shan, stands at 957 metres - that’s more than twice the height of the Empire State Building! Enjoy our stunning cityscape here, until you’re next in town.

📸: IG@jaspar_cheng https://t.co/R0L5uoWPpS

We're automatically renewing all #MarcoPoloClub memberships and unused mid-tier benefits set to expire between May 2020 and April 2021 for another 12 months, so you can enjoy them when you travel again. We look forward to seeing you onboard soon.https://t.co/awyPdmMagj T&Cs apply https://t.co/pk0bRBTZyK

data.text:
Get an early taste of summer with our signature #cocktail creation, Pacific Sunrise. Once you’ve perfected this drink, you’ll be ready for the mysterious masterpiece that completes the set: Oriental Breeze. #TillWeFlyAgain

Please drink responsibly
Legal age limits apply https://t.co/lyIviewhjL

Nothing is more important to us than your wellbeing. For your added protection, we now require all our passengers to wear a face covering throughout the different stages of your journey. For more details, please visit: https://t.co/Yh2ipui7Cv. #WeAreInThisTogether https://t.co/OUHQvMFHt3

We want to make it easy for you to change your travel plans. To give you the flexibility you need, we’ve introduced a few options for changing your ticket - watch to see which suits you best. https://t.co/wayGsUSbqD

As we await clearer skies, this #InternationalNursesDay we’re grateful for the courage and dedication of medical staff worldwide. Your tireless efforts to protect and maintain health globally inspires us and reaffirms our belief that together, we'll come out of this stronger. https://t.co/frR7LXR8Oo

data.text: Tokyo Tower is an iconic landmark in one of our favourite destinations – #Japan. Built in 1957 and 333-metres tall, she boasts impressive views of #Tokyo. data.text: We may not all be together this Mother’s Day, but that shouldn’t stop us from celebrating the amazing work that mums do every day. data.text:
Elevate your senses and find yourself on Cloud Nine with this iconic creation. We recommend pairing this refreshment with a nice view for better tasting pleasure. Stay tuned for more delicious recipes next week! 🥂 
#TillWeFlyAgain

Please drink responsibly
Legal age limits apply https://t.co/3smfk7O5ki

Hands up if you’re looking forward to heading Down Under soon - we know we are! Let’s see how well you know the lovely city of #Sydney. There are 6 differences between both of these photos – can you spot them all? https://t.co/EHTCToobHU

data.text:
The Boeing 747-8F can carry up to 135,000 kg, with a special nose opening that accommodates larger cargo. Do you know how many of these aircraft we have in our fleet?

Credit: Instagram@jasonspotter0605 https://t.co/KMWnlryQWC

Seats as cargo holds, crew as cargo marshals, passengers as boxes of PPE – we made a few changes when our first passenger aircraft with cargo loaded in the cabin took off on 23 April. But our focus on safety, teamwork and can-do spirit stayed the same and made this possible. https://t.co/W9AL7xbra1

Stay home, stay safe, stay happy

Your safety is always of the utmost importance to us, so we designed this in-home safety card just for you. For now, stay home, stay safe, and we can’t wait to fly with you again soon!

#MoveBeyond #StayHomeStaySafe #TillWeFlyAgain https://t.co/ciKqHKQhoa

data.text: COVID-19 has left some underprivileged students with no easy access to online learning. To help them, we’ve refurbished 500 iPads for local students from NGOs across HK. It’s one small way we’re hoping to help our home community get through these challenging times, together. https://t.co/iqJxAT7Jyz

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
Yet to try our famous Cathay Delight #mocktail or miss its taste at 30,000 ft? Now you can enjoy it at home! All you need is whole milk, coconut milk, kiwi juice, mint leaves and the final secret ingredient unveiled in our video 🍸

#TillWeFlyAgain #cocktailsathome #cheers https://t.co/tUkE3vbXio

As global demand for surgical masks, hand sanitisers and PPE has risen, so has our determination to provide cargo capacity. In the past two months, our Cargo team has operated over 1,600 flights to areas where supplies are needed most. We stand committed to connecting the world. https://t.co/7WpKmWaJp2
Look closer, and find wonders of the world from the comforts of your own home. #TillWeFlyAgain, let your imagination take flight. What do you see? https://t.co/iFPQLfYwQI

Over the past few months, we’ve been coordinating with local and overseas authorities to bring people home from all over the world on charters and specially arranged commercial flights. Heartfelt thanks to all ground & office teams, and flight crew who keep these efforts going. https://t.co/2wh5iwDbH7

We understand that travel plans may change, more than once! If your booking meets the requirements here: https://t.co/Vn3f1xYcuR, watch how you can make unlimited changes to your itinerary easily on https://t.co/wa5i1yhkCZ, with no extra charge.
*Terms and Conditions apply https://t.co/Wd2Y7VxeY0

Our parked aircraft are given meticulous attention. We cover their engines; wash and cover flight compartment windows and windshields with reflective material; cover wheel assemblies; and cover internal furnishings in the cabin. We’re staying ready to welcome you onboard, soon. https://t.co/OpPoMb8f9Q

#MarcoPoloClub members, we're renewing all memberships and unused mid-tier benefits set to expire between May and December 2020 for another 12 months, so you can enjoy them when you travel again. We look forward to seeing you onboard, soon. https://t.co/awyPdn3L7R
T&Cs apply https://t.co/WFLaqGjoJQ

Things can change, so we’re offering unlimited changes to  for all new tickets purchased before 30 June 2020 at no extra cost. Make changes up to a year after purchase, change dates, or pick a new destination, as many times as you like. Fly worry-free: https://t.co/i02wignEc4 https://t.co/78rw9KP98b

data.text:
🗣 #倫敦 #希斯路 #LHR （香港時間 4月14日 21:45）

希斯路機場將關閉三號航站樓。國泰航空的航班由4月16日（星期四）起將改為從二號航站樓升降。專屬登機櫃檯位於二號航站樓A區A1-A6號。更多資訊，請瀏覽👇https://t.co/uiZHy4477a

data.text:
🗣 #London #Heathrow #LHR (14:30/14APR GMT+1)

All Cathay Pacific operations at #Heathrow will move to Terminal 2 wef 16Apr (Thur) due closure of Terminal 3. Our new dedicated counters are located in A1-A6 Zone A Terminal 2. More info 👇 https://t.co/w4JbDtzzwX

data.text:
In these challenging times, we must stay strong and resilient as we strive to #MoveBeyond the horizon, and on to new journeys, soon.  #WeAreInThisTogether 
 
Credit: Instagram@vdubl https://t.co/OwSr7h3UCK

We hope you’re staying healthy and practicing #socialdistancing. Here’s a word search to keep you entertained. Let us know if you’ve found all seven #aviation terms hidden in this word search! https://t.co/HIZzRAcmLa

data.text:
Our resolve and willpower will get us through the toughest, most seemingly impossible situations. As long as we stay strong and stand as one, we're confident we will be able to #MoveBeyond these challenges together.
 
Credit: Instagram@lester318 https://t.co/n1S1LUCzHa

Even in challenging times, we're committed to our role: connecting the world. Our Cargo team is working around the clock to fly personal protective equipment, medicine, food, and more to HongKong and the rest of the world. Adapting to life's ups and downs - that's the #HK spirit. https://t.co/fx65YOZXM0

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

data.text: Our Chief Customer and Commercial Officer explains how we're bringing more flexibility for your journeys, as well as safeguarding yours and our crew's wellbeing. Thank you for your continuous support and we look forward to seeing you soon. Watch here: https://t.co/RQxsnPZHND https://t.co/IOul8Poddd

With effect from 00:00 HKT on 25 March 2020, the Hong Kong SAR Government will introduce additional restrictions regarding entry into and transit through Hong Kong. Please visit https://t.co/VNTFhHotPq for details.
8/8 Our teams are working around the clock and assisting you. We thank you for your understanding and continued support, and can’t wait to see you again on our flights soon!

7/8 We will continue to maintain a limited number of flights in April and May to and from key destinations in our network to ensure these vital arteries remain open. For details, please visit https://t.co/sTb8jJJLhf.

6/8 BOOKED ON OUR WEBSITE, APP OR OUR CONTACT CENTRE 
The fastest way to manage your booking, including refunds, is to log in to Manage Booking https://t.co/L0AzF1i2mj.

5/8 BOOKED THROUGH TRAVEL AGENTS OR THIRD PARTY WEBSITES
Please contact them directly to manage your booking. We are unable to process bookings made through a travel agent or third-party website including refunds.

4/8 AFFECTED JOURNEYS
You’ll receive an email from us in the coming days with information on alternative arrangements.

data.text:
3/8 We've updated our refund and rebooking guidelines for all tickets issued before March 17, 2020: https://t.co/rs2RIuidL7.
If you are not travelling with us in the next 72 hours, please do not call our contact centres, as we are prioritising immediate itineraries.
2/8 In these challenging times, we would like to provide more flexible ticketing arrangements so that you can change your itinerary as needed.

data.text: 1/8 As #HongKong’s home carrier, we provide important passenger and cargo connections to and from our #HK hub. In light of #COVID_19, and governments' travel restrictions, we will reduce capacity by 96% across our passenger network in April and May. https://t.co/49tKBlebfF

Given #COVID19, travel restrictions may change at short notice. Stay informed:
Flight status: https://t.co/MGv1WBlUgb
Restrictions: https://t.co/VNTFhHotPq
Refunds & ticket changes: https://t.co/rs2RIuidL7
Arrival in HK: https://t.co/J58GKNlczq
Others: https://t.co/FT35igWaoN https://t.co/4CYVVSkXc5

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Along with cleaning measures taken in between each flight, upon a confirmed case of #COVID19 on our aircraft, professionals implement a 5-hour deep clean. Out of an abundance of caution for our customers and crew, every area is disinfected thoroughly. Watch how. https://t.co/ddZc2AYhTV

Plans can change in uncertain times. That’s why we’re offering you the flexibility to make #free and #unlimited changes to all new bookings made between 9 Mar and 20 Apr. Visit https://t.co/hVBJlSrdrA for more. T&C apply. https://t.co/UD9baZBuXh

data.text:
First Officer Tanis Herriot says "I love to fly and enjoy the camaraderie that’s needed to operate aircraft across the globe. I hope to inspire everyone to follow their dreams. The sky is not the limit."
#InternationalWomensDay #IWD2020
Follow her on Instagram: tanisthepilot https://t.co/Hb4pl8hhn3

data.text: We’re working hard to safeguard our passengers’ and our staff's health and wellbeing at all times. Our Head of Occupational Health, Valni Haughton elaborates on our efforts and response to the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) here: https://t.co/dnwkKnJakd https://t.co/4It5maPEC5

[2 of 2] If your ticket was not booked on https://t.co/wa5i1yhkCZ or via our  Reservations team, please contact your travel agent directly for assistance.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

With extended waiting times due to a high volume of incoming msgs, pls visit https://t.co/XHCKu3OJYn for info incl. flight status before reaching out to us.
On-ground and at 35,000 feet, we’ve set new ambitions for 2020 and ahead. Here’s how we’re going to #MoveBeyond, and take you on this journey with us: https://t.co/cDaDb0iPna https://t.co/DMkuhZKHP2
